price: Dokaz im je mrtva zemlja: Mi joj život dajemo i iz nje niče žito koje oni jedu.
arabic: وَءَايَةٞ لَّهُمُ ٱلۡأَرۡضُ ٱلۡمَيۡتَةُ أَحۡيَيۡنَٰهَا وَأَخۡرَجۡنَا مِنۡهَا حَبّٗا فَمِنۡهُ يَأۡكُلُونَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: waāyatun lahumu al-arḍu al-maytatu aḥyaynāhā wa-akhrajnā min'hā ḥabban famin'hu yakulūna
